Press the "Submit" button or "Ctrl" to save your solution.

If you want to modify your answer after saving it, selecte the type box, apply your changes, and re-submit.

To compare your answer with the suggested solution, either press the "Show Answer" button or press "space" after you have submitted your answer.

Markup Meaning:

Correct Characters Text marked like this was typed by you into the text field, and does appear in the suggested Solution.

Missed Characters Text marked like this was not typed by you into the text field, but does appear in the suggested Solution.

False Characters Text marked like this typed by you into the text field, but does not appear in the suggested Solution.
